section.name: Introduction
section.p: At any time, all the code in the git repository should be compilable and should pass all the unit tests. There is no guarantee that it will be full featured - this is a work in progress.

section.name: Latest build
section.p: Sonatype hosts HtmlUnit snapshot, which is manually updated by the team once in a while. If you need a recent build feel free to contact us.

subsection.name: Maven snapshot
subsection.p: Add the snapshot repository and dependency to your pom.xml

subsection.name: Gradle snapshot
subsection.p: Add the snapshot repository and dependency to your build.gradle
subsection.source:
<project>
repositories {
  maven { url "https://central.sonatype.com/repository/maven-snapshots/" }
  // ...
}
// ...
dependencies {
    implementation group: 'org.htmlunit', name: 'htmlunit', version: '4.15.0-SNAPSHOT'
  // ...
}
